text: María Juliana Ruiz Sandoval (born 25 May 1978) is a Colombian socialite and lawyer. She was the First Lady of Colombia from 2018 to 2022. She is married to Iván Duque Márquez. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:First Ladies of Colombia Category:People from Bogotá Category:Colombian lawyers
title: María Juliana Ruiz
